lessonTitle: The Smallest, Easiest Interaction - Full Conversation
markdown:
# The Smallest, Easiest Interaction - Full Conversation
- Barista
> Dia duit! Cad is féidir liom a fháil duit?
> DEE-ah gwich! Cod iss FEH-dir lum uh ayl gwich?
> Hello! What can I get for you?

- Customer
> Dia is Muire duit. Cupán tae, le do thoil
> DEE-ah iss MWIR-eh gwich. Kuh-PAWN teh, leh duh hull
> Hi, a cup of tea, please

- Barista
> Sin trí euro. Cárta nó airgead tirim?
> Shin tree YUR-oh. KAR-tuh noh AR-gid TIR-im?
> That's three euro. Card or cash?

- Customer
> Cárta
> KAR-tuh.
> Card

- Barista
> Seo duit! Tá an bainne agus siúcra ar an mbord sin
> Sho gwich! Taw un BAN-yuh ah-gus SHOOK-ruh er un moard shin.
> Here you are! The milk and sugar are on that table

- Customer
> Go raibh maith agat! Slán
> Guh rev mah ah-gut! Slawn.
> Thank you! Goodbye

- Barista
> Tá fáilte romhat, slán go fóill!
> Taw FAWL-chuh ruh-ut, slawn guh foh-ill!
> You're welcome, goodbye!
